author: jstrachan
msg: An intial patch at starting to refactor a little the contract between TagScript and TagLibrary. Hopefully we can make this a little simpler in future.

author: jstrachan
msg: Patch to avoid Mock Tags or new overloaded dynamic tag libraries being overridden in included Jelly scripts

author: jstrachan
msg: Added new SQL tags that allow a ResultSet to be created programatically without actually performing any SQL.
This can be useful for implementing Mock Tags (like Mock Objects but Tags) etc.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added support for inheritence of dynamic tag libraries. This allows individual tags to be overloaded from an existing library or from a dynamic library.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added support for inheritence of dynamic tag libraries. This allows individual tags to be overloaded from an existing library or from a dynamic library.
